name: people
Command: cd ~/code/yolov5/;~/miniconda3/envs/yolov5/bin/python -m torch.distributed.run --nproc_per_node 4 train.py --batch 64 --img 1280 --epochs 150 --data data/people.yaml --weights weights/yolov5m.pt --hyp data/hyps/hyp.qianhai-high.yaml --cfg models/qianhai_yolov5m.yaml --sync-bn --sorted-iou --device 0,1,2,3 --name peolpe --exist-ok  --include_class 0
